message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the construction of exact-repair minimum storage regenerating (exact-MSR) codes for distributed storage systems, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the complexity of data repair, which is a topic related to computational complexity (cs.CC) and numerical analysis (cs.NA). Additionally, the paper proposes new constructions for exact-MSR codes, which is a topic related to coding theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SI). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IT and cs.DS, followed by cs.SI, cs.CC, and cs.NA.
